Description: Brief Introduction: Although time is instantly accessible via a myriad of digital devices nowadays, pocket watch is making a strong comeback thanks to the nostalgia in the fashion world. No words here to flatter this unique fob watch, you can find its charm yourself. Main Features: - Mechanical hand wind movt. Need no battery to power this watch, both eco-friendly and economically - Made of copper, classy in look and tough in structure - One cover on each side of the watch, you can put it stably on the table with two covers open - Shiny surface looks nice and touches smooth - Durable spring operated lid, easy for you to open it - Come with a 39cm / 15.35 inch removable matching chain, you can either hang it on your clothes as a chic decoration or put it in your pocket Case material: Copper Case Shape: Round Dial Diameter: 1.5 inch Dial Display: Analog Gender: Unisex Movement: Mechanical Hand Wind Style: Antique Product weight: 0.117 kg Package weight: 0.117 kg Product Size(L x W x H): 6.50 x 5.00 x 1.00 cm / 2.56 x 1.97 x 0.39 inches Package Size(L x W x H): 8.50 x 7.50 x 4.00 cm / 3.35 x 2.95 x 1.57 inches Package Contents: 1 x Pocket Watch Payment: 1.
